name: businessinsider
text:
RT @kattenbarge: The Pittsburgh Post-Gazette barred one of its few Black journalists, @alexisjreports, from protest-related coverage over  one of her tweets. I talked to Alexis and to @michaelafuoco about the troubling developments that have occurred at the paper since.
https://t.co/goADaHLCng

name: businessinsider
text: RT @sam_grindell: New from me for @businessinsider: Artist Shantell Martin slammed Microsoft and the advertising firm McCann after the duo asked her to make a Black Lives Matter mural "while the protests are still relevant" https://t.co/R7c3irTWNq
